pages.text: Item Containers are the primairy items this mod adds. They have 6 main stats which can be seen by hoilding $(3)Shift$(clear) while hovering over the stack with your mouse. $(li)Slot count (the amount of slots it has) $(li)Slot capacity (how many items a slot can hold) $(li)Allowed size (what's the largest TFC size allowed in the slots)

$(li)Item pickup if it can pickup item entities from the world. Shift right click or use $(k:sns.key.pickup) to toggle $(li)Item voiding if it can void excess items picked up from the world. Use $(k:sns.key.void) to toggle $(li)Inventory interaction if you can insert and extract from it by clicking on the stack like TFC vessels or vanilla bundles
